title: New: Space Cubs – Why Are You Resisting? (New Version)
content: Stumbling upon Space Cubs before her ‘official launch’, the original tracks put online by Suzanne Bonifacio have since disappeared, and subsequently been replaced by a re-recorded version of Why Are You Resisting?. As gorgeously layered as the original, the production is smoother and still centred around the XX-style, bass drum section. Check out Why Are You Resisting below, and keep up with Space Cubs on Facebook. Also, if you’re in Buffalo (just on the off chance…), check her out supporting Majical Cloudz tonight.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
